name: The Chaos Gene
description:
The Chaos Gene is a classic 1v1 inspired fighting game. This is a indie passion project Inspired by classic fighting game series like Street Fighter, KOF, Killer Instinct and Guilty Gear & MK. I hope to provide players with a new gaming experience with the nostalgia of the classic fighting games. It is being released in early access so I can get support and feedback from the community to help polish and balance the game.

Features Available now
8 Playable Characters
14 Stages
Local Versus Mode
Vs CPU
Training Mode

Coming Soon
20 Total playable characters
Story Mode
Challenges Mode
Online Multiplayer (RollBack)
